title: Product Specialist - Laser Machine (m/f)
description:
*Responsibilities:*

* Become technical expert for 2D laser machines for sheet metal processing. Provide technical product support and training to sales department.
* Develop and implement comprehensive marketing plan to increase market share. Design product demonstrations for trade shows, marketing materials, technical seminars. Influence pricing strategy.
* Analyze competitor products and features and develop technical sales arguments.
* Define local customer requirements and communicate with R&D department in Germany.
* Assist in defining product development roadmap for next generation machines.

*Qualifications and Requirements:*

* Diplom/Master diploma from German University
* Major in Mechanical engineering or similar (“Maschinenbau”, “Wirtschaftsingenieur” or comparable course of studies)
* Clear and well structured oral and written communication skills, strong analytical capabilities, good technical background in order to understand advanced machines and processing technologies
* Mandarin, fluent German, English: CET 6 will be plus

*Interested in the following job opportunity ?*

The easiest way to apply is your online application. Please
send your English application with your resume and all
relevant certificates to recruiting.TH600@de.trumpf.com

*Do you have any questions?* 

Tobias Unger (07156-303-32075) will be happy to assist you.
